body_html: Can you actually just move everything in install_requires to https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/requirements.txt ? Or I guess we can wait until FULL_CAFFE2 is the default and just delete these reqs for now.

body: Can you actually just move everything in install_requires to https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/requirements.txt ?  Or I guess we can wait until FULL_CAFFE2 is the default and just delete these reqs for now.
